title: #340 - Rudy Sarzo and Dean Delray
description:
Rudy Sarzo, Musician and Bass Player who has played with, among others, Black Sabbath, White Snake and Quiet Riot joins Dean Delray, Comedian and Host of the "Let There Be Talk" podcast, with Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt in studio.

 

This podcast is brought to you by:

Texture. Go To texture.com/history to get a free trial for the Texture App. The Texture App gives the use access to hundreds of magazines.

Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a discount at checkout.
 
HITecigs.com For a better tasting, longer lasting e cig go to HITecigs.com. Use Promo code joeyschurch for five Hit E Cig's for $50
 
Recorded live on 12/14/2015. 
 

Music: 

Papa Was A Rolling Stone - The Temptations

I Wanna Be Around - Tony Bennet

Diary Of A Madman - Ozzy Osbourne
